rows.processing_rule: Manufacture from animals of Chapter 1
Manufacture in which all the materials of Chapters 2 and 3 used must be wholly obtained

rows.description: Fish and crustaceans, molluscs and other aquatic invertebrates; except for:
rows.processing_rule: All the materials of Chapter 3 used must be wholly obtained

rows.description: Fish fillets and other fish meat (whether or not minced), fresh, chilled of frozen
rows.processing_rule: Manufacture in which the value of any materials of Chapter 3 used does not exceed 15% of the ex-works price of the product

rows.description: Fish, dried, salted or in brine; smoked fish, whether or not cooked before or during the smoking process; flours, meals and pellets of fish, fit for human consumption
rows.processing_rule: Manufacture in which the value of any materials of Chapter 3 used does not exceed 15% of the ex-works price of the product

rows.description: Crustaceans, whether in shell or not, dried, salted or in brine; crustaceans, in shell, cooked by steaming or by boiling in water, whether or not chilled, frozen, dried, salted or in brine; flours, meals and pellets of crustaceans, fit for human consumption
rows.processing_rule: Manufacture in which the value of any materials of Chapter 3 used does not exceed 15% of the ex-works price of the product

rows.description: Molluscs, whether in shell or not, dried, salted or in brine; aquatic invertebrates other than crustaceans and molluscs, dried, salted or in brine; flours, meals and pellets of crustaceans, fit for human consumption

rows.description: Products of animal origin, not elsewhere specified or included; except for:
rows.processing_rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of Chapter 5 used must be wholly obtained

rows.description: Flour, meal and powder of the dried, shelled leguminous vegetables of heading No 0713

rows.description: Preparations of meat, of fish or of crustaceans, molluscs or other aquatic invertebrates; except for:

rows.description: Undenatured ethyl alcohol of an alcoholic strength by volume of 80% vol or higher; ethyl alcohol and other spirits, denatured, of any strength.
